title: [BUG]  Valid Lottie file not shown
body:
**Description**

<!-- a general description goes here -->

Used the following Lottie file: https://lottiefiles.com/36895-healthy-or-junk-food
Seems to be related to the usage of the base64 encoded image data. Other Lottie files work just fine.

**Code**

```xaml
<!--  or use local file name  -->
<skia:SKLottieView
                HeightRequest="200"
                HorizontalOptions="Center"
                RepeatCount="-1"
                Source="https://assets4.lottiefiles.com/packages/lf20_tll0j4bb.json"
                WidthRequest="200" />
```

**Expected Behavior**

<!-- a general description of what was the expected behavior or result -->
Shows the animation.

**Actual Behavior**

<!-- a general description of what really happened -->
Does not show anything at all.

**Basic Information**

- Version with issue:  2.0.0-preview.61
- Last known good version:  none
- IDE:  Visual Studio
- Platform Target Frameworks: <!-- all that apply, remove the platforms that aren't broken or haven't had any testing -->
  - Android: 21
- Target Devices:   <!-- the devices that you noticed this on, e.g. iPhone X -->
  - Device OnePlus 10 Pro
  
<details>
  <summary>Detailed IDE/OS information (click to expand)</summary>
  
```

PASTE ANY DETAILED VERSION INFO HERE

```
</details>


**Screenshots**

<!-- if the issue is a visual issue, please include screenshots showing the problem if possible -->

**Reproduction Link**

<!-- please upload or provide a link to a reproduction case -->

comments.author: ricardodevbsb
comments.body: any idea how to fix this?

comments.author: thomaskaelin
comments.body: Having the same issue right now. Any workarounds for this? Or is there another alternative for integrating Lottie other than SkiaSharp?

comments.author: nathenxbrewer
comments.body:
> Duplicate of #169

This is not a duplicate. #169 is referencing the ability to put .png paths inside of the lottie json. OP is referencing an issue where base64 PNGs are not rendering. I am having the same issue while using base64 in my lottie file.

comments.author: mattleibow
comments.body:
I think it is a duplicate as none of the image in the json are supported - files or embedded. This is a feature that is enabled in the internal builder that is not yet exposed in SkiaSharp.

I'll add a comment in the other issue just so I can test both.

comments.author: nathenxbrewer
comments.body:
> I think it is a duplicate as none of the image in the json are supported - files or embedded. This is a feature that is enabled in the internal builder that is not yet exposed in SkiaSharp.
> 
> I'll add a comment in the other issue just so I can test both.

Ok, that works, thanks. So you're saying that this fix may be coming soon?

comments.author: mattleibow
comments.body: Ah, sorry for false hope. Not sure yet. The real issue is tracked here and lots of people are asking for it: https://github.com/mono/SkiaSharp/issues/2173

comments.author: mattleibow
comments.body: This PR will get us to the happy place: https://github.com/mono/SkiaSharp/pull/2630
